snippet: The Saudi Ministry of Civil Service is looking for eight swordsmen to carry out beheadings for crimes like drug dealing, arms smuggling and murder.
abstract: Saudi Arabian government advertises eight job openings for executioners to perform beheadings and hand amputations in public squares; rate of executions in country, especially for non-violent drug-related crimes, has increased sharply since ascendance of King Salman to throne.
lead_paragraph: The Saudi Ministry of Civil Service is looking for eight swordsmen to carry out beheadings for crimes like drug dealing, arms smuggling and murder.

headline.print_headline: Saudis Post Ad to Hire Executioner
